DOC.brief_summary: This study 's primary objective determine providing individual personal genetic information impact dietary intake behaviour . Specifically , investigator examine whether provide dietary advice base gene affect metabolism sensitivity caffeine , vitamin C , sugar sodium impact intake dietary component . The study hypothesis provide dietary advice base genetics impact dietary behaviour great extent general dietary recommendation .
DOC.criteria: 2035 year old participant Toronto Nutrigenomics Health Study pregnancy nurse vitamin C supplement user caffeine intake < 100 mg/day total sugar intake < 10 % energy sodium intake < 1500 mg/day
